column4: hi, in earlier versions of ubuntu there was a device manager with a nifty GUI , is there any one for hardy 8.04
is there any device manager for ubuntu 8.04 with a GUI ?
what do you mean by device manager?
a program that shows me my computer hardware and their drivers
take a look at the program hardinfo, its in the ubuntu repo's
: from the places menu , clicking anything that has direct connections to folders opens up totem player
thats a known problem with a fix, lemme see if I can find it for you
Why is my Places menu launching applications instead of opening Nautilus?
